posts.title: Introduction to Blockchain Technology
posts.excerpt: Exploring the fundamentals of blockchain technology and its potential applications in various industries. From Bitcoin to smart contracts, understanding the building blocks of decentralized systems.

posts.title: Understanding Cryptographic Hash Functions
posts.excerpt: A deep dive into cryptographic hash functions, their properties, and their role in securing digital systems. Learn about SHA-256, collision resistance, and practical applications.

posts.excerpt: Essential mathematical concepts that underpin modern machine learning algorithms. Linear algebra, calculus, and statistics fundamentals for understanding AI systems.

posts.title: Zero-Knowledge Proofs Explained
posts.excerpt: Understanding zero-knowledge proofs and their applications in privacy-preserving systems. From zk-SNARKs to zk-STARKs, exploring the mathematics of privacy.
posts.author: Prashish Phunyal

posts.title: Thoughts on Code Review
posts.excerpt: Quick thoughts on effective code review practices. What makes a good review, common pitfalls, and building better development workflows.

posts.title: Understanding Graph Theory
posts.excerpt: An introduction to graph theory and its applications in computer science. From shortest paths to network analysis, exploring the mathematics of connections.
